Class ArchiveIngestorTest

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.core.ArchiveIngestorTest
public class ArchiveIngestorTest extends Object

This test class is used to run unit tests and integration tests for the ArchiveIngestor class/service.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final ArrayList<String>
    expectedCategories
    This test attribute is used to hold a list of possible AO3 story categories.

    testRuntime
    This test attribute is used to hold the runtime used to run system commands.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveIngestorTest

      public ArchiveIngestorTest()

  • Method Details

    • setupTests

      @BeforeAll public static void setupTests() throws IOException, InterruptedException

      This test method is used to set up the test link, the archive ingestor, and the selenium container.

      Throws:
      IOException - If the ArchiveIngestor.getJSONFromFilepath() line experiences an I/O exception.
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() is interrupted mid-execution.

    • testSelenium

      @Test public void testSelenium()

      This test method is used to ensure the web driver is set up correctly.

    • testBadWork

      @Test public void testBadWork()

      This test method is used to ensure that a bad AO3 work link is properly detected.

    • testArchiveVersion

      @Test public void testArchiveVersion()

      This test method is used to ensure the current OTW archive version of AO3 is supported.

    • runChapterTests

      public void runChapterTests(ArchiveChapter testArchiveChapter, String storyCreationTimestamp)

      This test method is used to run a batch of chapter-level assertion tests.

      Parameters:
      testArchiveChapter - The archive chapter of interest.
      storyCreationTimestamp - The creation timestamp of a corresponding ArchiveStory object.

    • testChapterParse

      @Test public void testChapterParse() throws InterruptedException, ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException, ArchiveIngestorCanceledException, ArchiveElementNotFoundException, ArchivePageNotFoundException

      This test method uses the chapter test links to test the functionality of the archive ingestor.

      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the testIngestor.createChapter() line returns the exception.
      ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException - If the testIngestor.createChapter() line returns the exception.
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If the testIngestor.createChapter() line returns the exception.
      ArchiveElementNotFoundException - If the testIngestor.createChapter() line returns the exception.
      ArchivePageNotFoundException - If the testIngestor.createChapter() line returns the exception.

    • runStoryTests

      public void runStoryTests(ArchiveStory testArchiveStory)

      This test method is used to run a batch of story-level assertion tests.

      Parameters:
      testArchiveStory - The archive story of interest.

    • testStoryParse

      @Test public void testStoryParse() throws InterruptedException, ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException, ArchiveIngestorCanceledException, ArchiveElementNotFoundException, ArchivePageNotFoundException

      This test method uses the story test links to test the functionality of the archive ingestor.

      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the testIngestor.createStory() line returns the exception.
      ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException - If the testIngestor.createStory() line returns the exception.
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If the testIngestor.createStory() line returns the exception.
      ArchiveElementNotFoundException - If the testIngestor.createStory() line returns the exception.
      ArchivePageNotFoundException - If the testIngestor.createStory() line returns the exception.

    • quitDriver

      @AfterAll public static void quitDriver() throws InterruptedException

      This test method is used to shut down running aspects of the archive ingestor tests.

      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the waitFor() lines is interrupted mid-execution.
